transcript: when I was 20 I wanted to be a millionaire but now that I'm a millionaire I want to be 20. so I overheard a version of this and it made me realize that when I'm 40 I'd just rather be 32 which is my age now with nothing and just 32 again and so it's just a different frame on gratitude depending on where you're at so maybe if you're young you don't have anything think about the fact that when you do have everything you trade everything you have to be where you're at right now I was talking to a billionaire friend of mine and he told me this
